institution-wrap.institution: National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases

funding-group.funding-statement: This work was funded in part by grant R01 AI26357-01S1 from the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases ( https://www.niaid.nih.gov/) awarded to JGM and pilot grant funding from the University of Florida Emerging Pathogens Institute ( www.epi.ufl.edu). The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
